tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE inventory_management (
    material_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    material_name VARCHAR(50),
    material_type VARCHAR(50),
    quantity INT,
    supplier_id UUID,
    supplier_name VARCHAR(50),
    supplier_contact VARCHAR(20)
)
CREATE TABLE materials ( material_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, material_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, quantity INT NOT NULL, price DECIMAL NOT NULL );
CREATE TABLE tools ( tool_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, tool_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, quantity INT NOT NULL, available BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT TRUE );
CREATE TABLE materials (material_id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(255), quantity INT, price DECIMAL(10,2));
CREATE TABLE suppliers (supplier_id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(255), location VARCHAR(255), phone VARCHAR(15));
CREATE TABLE orders (order_id INT PRIMARY KEY, material_id INT, supplier_id INT, order_date DATE, quantity INT);
CREATE TABLE inventory (inventory_id INT PRIMARY KEY, material_id INT, quantity INT, location VARCHAR(255));

CREATE TABLE tools (
    tool_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    tool_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    tool_category VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    unit_price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    quantity_in_stock INT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE orders (
    order_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    supplier_id INT NOT NULL,
    order_date DATE NOT NULL,
    total_cost DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT fk_supplier_id FOREIGN KEY (supplier_id) REFERENCES suppliers(supplier_id)
);

CREATE TABLE order_items (
    order_item_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    order_id INT NOT NULL,
    material_id INT NOT NULL,
    quantity_ordered INT NOT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT fk_order_id FOREIGN KEY (order_id) REFERENCES orders(order_id),
    CONSTRAINT fk_material_id FOREIGN KEY (material_id) REFERENCES materials(material_id)
);
